import FlowsheetWithSections from "./FlowsheetWithSections?dev-site-example";
import FlowsheetWithSubsections from "./FlowsheetWithSubsections?dev-site-example";

# Flowsheet Data Grid Sections

### Description

This example demonstrates a [Flowsheet Data Grid](/components/cerner-terra-framework-docs/data-grid/flowsheet-data-grid/about) component with information grouped by sections.

### Required Properties
* **sections**: The tabular information for the component.
* **isCollapsible**: This property determines whether a section is collapsible. Collapsible sections contain a button in the section header.
* **isCollapsed**: When users select the section header of a collapsible section, this property is toggled to control whether the section is expanded or collapsed.

<FlowsheetWithSections />
<FlowsheetWithSubsections />
